channel.title: scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily
channel.description: Recent content in scheme on YOJNA PORTAL 2025 - Govt Schemes & Sarkari Job Updates Daily

item.title: RSSB Agriculture Supervisor Vacancy 2026
item.description: Rajasthan Agriculture Supervisor Recruitment 2026 has been released by the Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) for 1100 posts under the Agriculture Department. Eligible candidates with B.Sc. in Agriculture or equivalent qualification can apply online through the SSO portal from 13/01/2026 to 11/02/2026. The selection process includes an offline OMR-based written examination scheduled on 18/04/2026, followed by document verification as per rules.

item.title: RSSB Female Supervisor Vacancy 2026
item.description: Rajasthan Supervisor Female Direct Recruitment 2026 has been announced by the Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) for the Women & Child Development Department, Rajasthan. A total of 72 posts are available exclusively for female candidates. Selection will be done on the basis of CET (Graduation Level) 2024 score, and the pay scale will be as per Rajasthan Pay Matrix Level-7.

item.title: UPPSC Medical Officer, Veterinary & Various Posts Online Form 2025
item.description: UPPSC Direct Recruitment 2025 has been released under Advertisement No. D-6/E-1/2025 to fill 2158 Group B Gazetted posts in various departments of Uttar Pradesh. The recruitment covers Medical Officer, Veterinary Officer, Drug Inspector and AYUSH related posts including Ayurveda, Unani and Homoeopathy. Interested and eligible applicants can apply online via the OTR based registration process from 22/12/2025 to 22/01/2026. The selection procedure will consist of a Screening Test followed by an Interview in accordance with UPPSC guidelines.

item.title: NABARD Development Assistant Vacancy 2026
item.description: National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) has released the Development Assistant Recruitment 2026 notification for a total of 162 posts, including Development Assistant and Development Assistant (Hindi). The recruitment is open to graduates who meet the prescribed eligibility criteria.

item.title: CBSE Group A, B & C Posts Vacancy 2026 - Exam City
item.description: CBSE has released the Direct Recruitment 2026 notification for 124 vacancies across Group A, B and C posts including Assistant Secretary, Assistant Professor, Accounts Officer, Superintendent, Junior Translation Officer, Junior Accountant and Junior Assistant. Eligible candidates can apply online from 02 December to 22 December 2025. Selection will be based on Tier-1 and Tier-2 examinations, followed by an interview or skill test as per the post.

item.title: SSC Multi Tasking Staff MTS Vacancy 2025- Self-Slot Booking
item.description: Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Multi-Tasking Staff (MTS) and Havaldar Recruitment 2025. Eligible 10th pass candidates can apply online for these posts. The selection includes CBT and Physical Test (for Havaldar). Check complete details including eligibility, age limit, application dates, and how to apply.

item.title: BPSC Boiler Inspector Vacancy 2026
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the Boiler Inspector Recruitment 2026 notification for 05 posts. Candidates with a degree in Mechanical, Production, Power Plant, or Metallurgical Engineering along with relevant experience are eligible to apply online. The selection will be based on academic qualifications and work experience. Interested applicants should apply online through the official BPSC website within the prescribed dates.

item.title: BPSC Deputy Director (Fire Service) Vacancy 2026
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the notification for Deputy Director (Fire Service) Recruitment 2026. A total of 14 vacancies are available under this recruitment. The online application process will be open from 13 January 2026 to 03 February 2026. Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s degree in Science or Engineering, along with recognized fire service training and a minimum of 12 years of relevant work experience. The selection will be based on educational qualifications, work experience, and interview. This recruitment offers a senior-level career opportunity for experienced fire service professionals.

item.title: BPSC State Fire Officer Vacancy 2026
item.description: BPSC has released the Additional Director-cum-Assistant State Fire Officer Recruitment 2026 notification for a total of 04 posts. Candidates must possess a Bachelor’s degree in Science or Engineering or a recognized Fire Officer qualification along with minimum 15 years of experience in the fire service. The selection process includes a written examination and an interview. Eligible candidates can apply online from 13 January 2026 to 03 February 2026 through the official BPSC website.

item.title: BPSC Factory Inspector Vacancy 2026
item.description: BPSC Factory Inspector Recruitment 2026 has been released for a total of 17 posts under the Labour Resources Department, Bihar. Candidates with a degree in Engineering, Technology, or Medicine (MBBS) from a recognized university are eligible to apply. The online application process starts on 12 January 2026 and ends on 02 February 2026. Selection will be based on academic merit, and interested candidates can apply through the official BPSC website.

item.title: NCERT Non-Academic Vacancy 2025
item.description: NCERT Non-Academic Recruitment 2025 is released for 173 posts by the National Council of Educational Research and Training. The recruitment will be carried out through direct recruitment. Applications will be accepted online, and candidates can apply within 21 days from the publication date in Employment News. Selection will be based on Written Test, Skill Test or Interview as per the post.

item.title: BPSC Assistant Conservator of Forests ACF Vacancy 2026
item.description: BPSC Assistant Conservator of Forests (ACF) Recruitment 2026 is announced for 12 posts under the Bihar Forest Department. Eligible graduates can apply online from 12/01/2026 to 02/02/2026. Selection will be based on written exam, physical test and interview.

item.title: BPSC Stenographer Vacancy 2026
item.description: BPSC Stenographer Recruitment 2026 has been released by the Bihar Public Service Commission for a total of 15 posts. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) and possess knowledge of Hindi shorthand, typing, and computer operation are eligible to apply. The online application process will start on 12/01/2026 and the last date to apply is 02/02/2026. Selection will be based on a written examination followed by a skill test.

item.title: RRB Junior Engineer Vacancy 2025 - Application Status
item.description: Railway Recruitment Boards (RRBs) have released the indicative notice for RRB JE Recruitment 2025 under CEN No. 05/2025. A total of 2570 vacancies are announced for Junior Engineer (JE), Depot Material Superintendent (DMS), and Chemical & Metallurgical Assistant (CMA) posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 31 October 2025 to 30 November 2025. Detailed information on application fees, qualifications, and selection process will be available in the official notification.

item.title: RRB Group D / Level 1 Vacancy 2026
item.description: Railway Recruitment Boards have released the indicative notice for Level-1 / Group D Recruitment under CEN 09/2025 to fill around 22000 vacancies across various RRB regions. These posts fall under Level-1 of the 7th Pay Commission with a starting pay of ₹18000 per month along with allowances. The online application process will begin on 21 January 2026 and will remain open till 20 February 2026 on the official RRB application portal. Candidates between 18 and 33 years of age as on 01 January 2026 who meet the prescribed educational qualifications will be eligible to apply. Complete details regarding post-wise eligibility selection process syllabus and medical standards will be available in the detailed notification published by the respective RRBs.

item.title: UP Police Constable Vacancy 2025
item.description: UP Police has released the Constable Recruitment 2025 notification for 32,679 vacancies across multiple units such as Civil Police, PAC, Special Security Force, Female Battalion, Mounted Police and Jail Warder. Applicants must have passed Intermediate (12th) from a recognized board. The prescribed age limit is 18 to 22 years for male candidates and 18 to 25 years for female candidates, with category-wise relaxation as per government norms. The recruitment process consists of a written test followed by PST, PET, document verification and medical examination. The online application window will be open from 31/12/2025 to 30/01/2026, making it one of the largest police recruitments in Uttar Pradesh.

item.title: UPSSSC Lekhpal Vacancy 2025
item.description: UPSSSC Lekhpal Recruitment 2025 offers 7994 vacancies under the Revenue Department, Uttar Pradesh. Applicants must have passed Intermediate (10+2) and qualified in UPSSSC PET 2025. The online application process will remain open from 29 December 2025 to 28 January 2026, and selection will be based on the main examination.

item.title: SSC CGL Tier - II Admit Card Out
item.description: SSC CGL 2025 में आवेदन करने के लिए उम्मीदवार के पास किसी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक डिग्री होना आवश्यक है। जूनियर स्टैटिस्टिकल ऑफिसर पद के लिए 10+2 स्तर पर गणित में न्यूनतम 60% अंक या स्नातक डिग्री में सांख्यिकी एक विषय होना चाहिए। स्टैटिस्टिकल इन्वेस्टिगेटर ग्रेड-II के लिए भी स्नातक में सांख्यिकी अनिवार्य विषय होना चाहिए। रिसर्च असिस्टेंट (NHRC) और अन्य सभी पदों के लिए किसी भी स्ट्रीम में स्नातक डिग्री मान्य है।

item.title: UCO Bank Generalist & Specialist Officer Vacancy 2026
item.description: UCO Bank has released the notification for recruitment of Generalist and Specialist Officers for a total of 173 posts. The online application process starts from 13 January 2026 and will continue till 02 February 2026. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official website. The selection process may include a written examination, screening, and interview as decided by the bank.

item.title: RBI Office Attendant Vacancy 2026
item.description: Reserve Bank of India has released the RBI Office Attendant Recruitment 2025 notification for 572 posts. Candidates who have passed 10th class and are undergraduates (graduates not eligible) can apply online from 15/01/2026 to 04/02/2026. Selection will be through an online examination followed by a Language Proficiency Test (LPT). The job offers a starting gross salary of around ₹46,000 per month, making it a good opportunity for 10th-pass candidates seeking a central bank job.

item.title: RSSB Clerk Grade II & Junior Assistant Vacancy 2026
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB) has announced Clerk Grade II and Junior Assistant Recruitment 2026 for a total of 10,644 posts. Candidates who have passed 12th class with a valid computer qualification are eligible to apply. The online application process will be open from 15/01/2026 to 13/02/2026, while the written examination will be conducted on 05/07/2026 and 06/07/2026. Vacancies are available in both Non-Scheduled and Scheduled Areas.

item.title: BPSC Assistant Town Planner Supervisor ATPS Vacancy 2026
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released Advertisement No. 07/2026 for 36 Assistant Town Planner and Town Planning Supervisor posts under the Urban Development & Housing Department, Government of Bihar. Selection will be through a written examination. Candidates with qualifications in Planning, Urban/Regional Planning or GIS can apply online from 14 January 2026 to 05 February 2026.

item.title: Delhi Police Constable Answer Key Out 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the Delhi Police Constable (Executive) Recruitment 2025 notification for 7565 vacancies. Both male and female candidates can apply online from 22 September to 21 October 2025. The recruitment process includes a Computer-Based Examination, followed by Physical Endurance & Measurement Tests (PE&MT). Eligible candidates must have passed 10+2, and male applicants must hold a valid LMV driving license. The pay scale is Level-3 (₹21,700 – ₹69,100). Reserved categories and women candidates are exempted from the application fee.

item.title: BSSC Inter Level Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the notification for the Inter Level Combined Competitive Exam 2025 with 23,175 vacancies across various departments. Eligible candidates can register online from 15th October 2025 to 25th November 2025, while the final submission deadline is 27th November 2025. The minimum qualification required is Intermediate (10+2) or equivalent along with computer knowledge and typing skills. This is one of the biggest recruitment drives in Bihar offering opportunities for thousands of aspirants.

item.title: Haryana Police Constable Vacancy 2026
item.description: Haryana Police Constable Recruitment 2026 is being organized by HSSC under CET Phase-II for 5500 Constable vacancies. Eligible candidates must be CET Group-C qualified. The selection will be carried out through PMT, PST, and Written Knowledge Test. The recruitment process is completely online, no application fee is required, and the pay scale for selected candidates is ₹21,700 under Level-3.

item.title: RSSB REET Mains Upper Primary Teacher Level-II Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the REET Mains Level-II Upper Primary School Teacher Recruitment 2025 for a total of 2123 posts under the Sanskrit Education Department. Eligible candidates can apply online from 07/11/2025 to 06/12/2025 through the official website rsmssb.rajasthan.gov.in. This recruitment includes vacancies for subjects like Sanskrit, Hindi, English, Social Science, and Maths-Science. Applicants must have a Graduation degree with B.Ed/D.El.Ed or 4-Year Integrated B.A./B.Sc. B.Ed as per NCTE norms. The application fee ranges from ₹400 to ₹600, and the exam is expected between 17/01/2026 to 21/01/2026. Interested candidates should check the official notification for eligibility, syllabus, and document requirements before applying.

item.title: RSSB REET Mains Primary Teacher Level-1 Vacancy 2025- Admit Card
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the Rajasthan Primary Teacher Recruitment 2025 notification for a total of 5636 Level-1 posts under the Primary Education Department and Sanskrit Education Department. Eligible candidates who have passed REET Level-1 can apply online from 07/11/2025 to 06/12/2025 through the official website rsmssb.rajasthan.gov.in. The recruitment includes General and Sanskrit teachers for both Non-TSP and TSP areas. Selection will be based on merit and eligibility as per REET qualification.

item.title: Nainital Bank PO, SO & CSA Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: Nainital Bank has released 185 vacancies for CSA, PO and Specialist Officer posts under the 2025 recruitment drive. Applications are open from 12 December 2025 to 01 January 2026, with the exam scheduled for 18 January 2026. Graduates, postgraduates, MBA and CA candidates can apply based on post-specific eligibility.

item.title: UPSC NDA 1 Vacancy 2026 - Exam Date
item.description: UPSC NDA 2026 recruitment announces 394 openings across the Army, Navy and Air Force wings. Unmarried male and female candidates meeting the 10+2 eligibility and born between 02 July 2007 and 01 July 2010 can apply online before 30 December 2025. The selection process includes a written exam, SSB interview and medical examination for admission to NDA and Naval Academy courses commencing January 2027.

item.title: KVS NVS Teaching & Non-Teaching Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: KVS NVS Recruitment 2025 offers more than 14967 Teaching and Non-Teaching vacancies under Kendriya Vidyalaya Sangathan and Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti. Eligible candidates can apply online from 14/11/2025 to 04/12/2025 for posts such as PRT, TGT, PGT, Principal, Clerk, Stenographer, Librarian and others. The application fee is ₹1500 for General, OBC and EWS categories, while SC, ST, PwD and all female candidates are exempted from fees. Qualifications vary by post and include 10th, 12th, Graduation, Post Graduation, B.Ed, D.El.Ed and CTET. The selection process includes a computer-based test followed by document verification.

item.title: SSC GD Constable Vacancy 2026 - Correction Start
item.description: The SSC GD Constable Recruitment 2026 has been announced for a total of 25,487 vacancies across various forces. The online application process will be conducted from 01/12/2025 to 31/12/2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10th (Matriculation) to be eligible. The selection process includes a Computer-Based Examination (CBT), Physical Efficiency Test (PET), Physical Standard Test (PST), and Medical Examination. The application fee is ₹100 for General/OBC/EWS, while SC/ST, Female, and Ex-Servicemen candidates are exempted from the fee. Detailed force-wise vacancies, age limit, physical standards, and exam pattern are provided in the official notification.

item.title: Aadhaar Supervisor Operator Online Form 2026
item.description: Aadhaar Supervisor / Operator – District Recruitment 2025–26 has been released for multiple states across India. Eligible candidates aged 18 years or above with 12th pass, ITI, or Polytechnic qualifications and a valid Aadhaar Operator/Supervisor certificate authorized by UIDAI can apply online. The selection includes certification and authorization approval, and remuneration will be as per state minimum wages for semi-skilled manpower. Applications are open till 31 January 2026 with state-wise apply links available.

item.title: BPSC Project Manager Vacancy 2026
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of 09 Project Manager posts under the Bihar Industries Service. Eligible candidates can apply online from 10th September 2025 to 6th October 2025. Candidates must hold at least a second-class degree in Engineering, MBA, PG Diploma, Economics, CA, CMA, Pharmacy, or related disciplines. The age limit is 21 to 37 years for UR male candidates, with relaxations applicable for reserved categories as per rules. The selection process will include Preliminary Exam (Objective), Main Written Exam, and Interview. The pay scale is Level–9.

item.title: Indian Army SSC Tech 67th Women Vacancy 2026
item.description: The Indian Army has announced SSC (Technical) 67 Women Recruitment 2026 for female engineering candidates. A total of 29 vacancies are available in Civil, Computer Science, Electrical, Electronics & Communication and Mechanical engineering streams. Eligible unmarried women can apply online between 06 January 2026 and 04 February 2026 at joinindianarmy.nic.in. The selection process includes shortlisting, SSB interview, medical examination and preparation of merit list. Selected candidates will undergo 49 weeks of training and will be paid a stipend of ₹56,100 per month during training.

item.title: Indian Army SSC Technical 67th Men Vacancy 2026
item.description: Indian Army has announced SSC (Tech) 67 Men Recruitment 2026 for 350 engineering graduate vacancies. Eligible unmarried male candidates aged 20–27 years can apply online between 07/01/2026 and 05/02/2026. Selection includes shortlisting, SSB interview, medical test and merit list. Selected candidates will receive training at OTA Gaya and be appointed as Lieutenant.

item.title: Railway RRB Technician Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the RRB Technician Recruitment 2025 notification for Technician Grade-1 (Signal) and Technician Grade-3 (Open Line) posts. Around 6238 vacancies will be filled. Grade-1 requires a B.Sc, BE/B.Tech or 3-year diploma in Physics, Electronics, Computer Science, IT, or Instrumentation. Grade-3 requires 10th pass with ITI in relevant trade from NCVT/SCVT. Eligible candidates can apply online. Please read the official notification for full details.

item.title: UPSC CDS 1 Vacancy 2026 - Exam Date
item.description: UPSC CDS (I) 2026 announces 451 vacancies for IMA, INA, AFA and OTA courses. Eligible graduates can apply from 10 to 30 December 2025. Selection includes a written exam, SSB interview and detailed medical assessment.

item.title: RRB Paramedical Staff 2025 - Exam Date
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB), Ministry of Railways, Government of India, has released the Centralized Employment Notice (CEN No. 03/2025) for Paramedical Categories Recruitment 2025 with a total of 434 vacancies across various posts including Nursing Superintendent, Pharmacist, Dialysis Technician, ECG Technician, Radiographer, and Lab Assistant. The online application process will begin on 09 August 2025 and will remain open until 08 September 2025 (11:59 PM). The educational qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10+2 with Diploma/Certificate to B.Sc. in relevant fields, and the age limit is 18 to 40 years as on 01 January 2026. The selected candidates will receive a salary ranging between ₹21,700 and ₹44,900 as per the 7th CPC Pay Matrix (Level 2 to Level 7). The selection process will consist of a Computer Based Test (CBT), Document Verification, and a Medical Examination. Candidates can apply through the official RRB regional websites such as rrbahmedabad.gov.in and others.

item.title: BPSSC Havildar Clerk Vacancy 2026
item.description: Havildar Clerk (Adhinayak Lipik) Recruitment 2026 has been announced by the :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0} (BPSSC) for direct recruitment in Bihar Home Guard under the Home Department (Special), Government of Bihar. The recruitment is being conducted for a total of 64 posts. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2) are eligible to apply online. The application process is open from 02 January 2026 to 02 February 2026. Selection will be based on a qualifying written examination followed by a Physical Efficiency Test (PET) and document verification. The application fee is ₹100 for all categories as per Advertisement No. 01/2026.

item.title: RSSB Forester / Vanpal Vacancy 2026
item.description: Rajasthan Forest Guard (Vanpal) Recruitment 2026 notification has been issued for 259 Forest Guard posts by the Rajasthan Forest Department. Candidates who have passed Senior Secondary (10+2) are eligible to apply online through the SSO portal. The recruitment process includes a written test, physical efficiency test and document verification. The online application window is open from 06/01/2026 to 04/02/2026 with category-wise OTR fee.

item.title: BPSSC Home Guard Havildar Clerk Vacancy 2026
item.description: BPSSC has issued the official notification for Bihar Home Guard Adhinayak Havildar Recruitment 2026 through Advertisement No. 02/2026. A total of 64 vacancies are available under the Home Guard quota. Candidates who have passed Intermediate (10+2), completed at least 5 years of Home Guard service, and are aged between 24 and 50 years as on 01/08/2025 are eligible to apply. The recruitment process consists of a qualifying written examination followed by a Physical Efficiency Test (PET), which will be used to prepare the final merit list. The online application process is open from 05 January 2026 to 05 February 2026 on the official BPSSC website.

item.title: EMRS Teaching & Non-Teaching Answer Key 2025
item.description: The National Education Society for Tribal Students (NESTS) has announced the EMRS Recruitment 2025 (ESSE-2025) notification for a total of 7267 vacancies across teaching and non-teaching posts. The vacancies include Principal, PGT, TGT, Female Staff Nurse, Hostel Warden, Accountant, Junior Secretariat Assistant (JSA), and Lab Attendant. Candidates can apply online until 23rd October 2025, with application fees ranging from ₹500 to ₹2500 depending on the post and category. The eligibility criteria vary by position, requiring qualifications from 10th/12th to Graduate, Postgraduate, B.Ed., CTET, or professional degrees. The age limit is set between 30 to 50 years, with applicable relaxations for reserved categories. This recruitment provides a major opportunity for aspirants seeking teaching and non-teaching jobs in Eklavya Model Residential Schools (EMRS) across India.

item.title: Delhi Police Head Constable Ministerial Recruitment 2025- Exam City / Admit Card Out
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Delhi Police Head Constable (Ministerial) Recruitment 2025. A total of 509 vacancies (341 male & 168 female) are available. Candidates with 10+2 qualification can apply online from 29/09/2025 to 20/10/2025. The selection process includes Computer Based Examination, Physical Endurance & Measurement Test (PE&MT), Typing Test, and Computer Formatting Test.

item.title: Indian Navy 10+2 B.Tech Cadet Entry July 2026 Online Form
item.description: Indian Navy 10+2 (B.Tech) Cadet Entry 2026 offers an opportunity to join the Indian Navy as a Permanent Commissioned Officer after completing a four-year B.Tech program at the Indian Naval Academy, Ezhimala. The recruitment is open to unmarried male and female candidates who appeared in JEE (Main) 2025. Shortlisting is done based on JEE Main CRL, followed by SSB interview and medical examination. A total of 44 vacancies are available, with up to 07 reserved for women. The online application process runs from 03/01/2026 to 19/01/2026, and no application fee is charged.

item.title: ECGC Probationary Officer Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: ECGC Limited, a Government of India enterprise, has released the official notification for the recruitment of 30 Probationary Officers (PO) for FY 2025–26, including 28 Generalist and 2 Specialist (Rajbhasha/Hindi) posts. The online application process will be open from 11 November to 2 December 2025, and the online examination is scheduled for 11 January 2026. Candidates must be graduates (for Generalist) or postgraduates in Hindi/English (for Specialist). The salary package is highly attractive, with a CTC of around ₹20 lakh per annum. Selection will be through online exam and interview, and shortlisted candidates may be posted anywhere in India under ECGC Ltd.

item.title: SBI Bank Specialist Officer SO Vacancy 2025
item.description: State Bank of India has released the Wealth Management Specialist Cadre Officer recruitment for VP Wealth (SRM), AVP Wealth (RM) and Customer Relationship Executive (CRE) posts. Online applications are open from 02 to 23 December 2025. Selection will be based on shortlisting and interview. Eligible candidates with the required qualification, experience and age criteria can apply online.

item.title: Delhi Police Constable Driver Answer Key Out 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Delhi Police Constable (Driver) – Male Recruitment 2025 with 737 vacancies. Applications can be submitted online from 24/09/2025 to 15/10/2025. Candidates must have 10+2 qualification, a valid Heavy Motor Vehicle (HMV) driving license, and knowledge of vehicle maintenance.

item.title: DRDO CEPTAM-11 Vacancy 2025
item.description: DRDO CEPTAM-11 Recruitment 2025 has been announced for a total of 764 vacancies, including 561 posts for Senior Technical Assistant-B and 203 posts for Technician-A. The online application process will begin on 09 December 2025 and is expected to remain open until 08 January 2026. Eligible candidates can apply online after checking the required qualification, age limit, and fee details. The exam date will be notified later.

item.title: CSBC Bihar Constable Driver Result 2025
item.description: This recruitment has been announced by RailTel Corporation of India Limited for various posts, where candidates will be selected based on interview and document verification. Interested candidates who fulfill all the required qualifications and experience can apply online. The last date to apply is August 5, 2025. This is a great opportunity for candidates aspiring to build a career in the fields of Electronics, Telecom, IT, and Networking. Before applying, all candidates are advised to carefully read the official notification to avoid any mistakes.

item.title: RRB Ministerial & Isolated Category Vacancy 2025
item.description: RRB Ministerial & Isolated Category Recruitment 2025 has been announced through CEN No. 08/2025 for 311 vacancies in various ministerial and isolated category posts. The recruitment is conducted by Railway Recruitment Boards under the Ministry of Railways. Eligible candidates can apply online from 30/12/2025 to 29/01/2026 and selection will be based on CBT, document verification and medical examination.

item.title: Bihar Police Sub Inspector Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: The Bihar Police Subordinate Services Commission (BPSSC) has released the Bihar Police SI Recruitment 2025 (Advt. No. 05/2025) for 1799 Sub-Inspector (SI) vacancies in the Home Department (Police Section), Government of Bihar. The pay scale for the post is Level-6 (₹35,400 – ₹1,12,400/-). Eligible candidates must hold a graduation degree from a recognized university by 01 August 2025. The age limit is 20–37 years for UR male candidates, 20–40 years for UR female/BC/EBC, and 20–42 years for SC/ST. The selection process includes a preliminary exam, main written exam, physical efficiency test, followed by document verification and medical test. The online application process will be open from 26 September 2025 to 26 October 2025, and the application fee is ₹100/- (payable online). Interested candidates can apply through the official website bpssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: Bihar BPSC AEDO Vacancy 2025 - Exam Date
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released the official notification for 935 Assistant Education Development Officer (AEDO) vacancies under the Education Department. The online application process will begin on 27 August 2025 and continue till 26 September 2025. Candidates with a graduate degree from a recognized university are eligible to apply. The salary will be as per Level-5 pay scale (₹29,200 + allowances). Applicants must pay an examination fee of ₹100/- plus bank charges through online mode. Interested candidates should visit the official website bpsc.bihar.gov.in to apply online and check detailed guidelines.

item.title: BPSC ATP Assistant Town Planner Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has announced 35 vacancies for Assistant Town Planner (ATP) under Advertisement No. 89/2025 in the Urban Development & Housing Department. The online application process will be open from 28th August 2025 to 22nd September 2025 on the official BPSC website. Candidates with a Post Graduate degree in Town Planning, Regional/Urban Planning, City Planning, Country/Transport Planning, Housing, or Environmental Planning are eligible to apply. The selection will be based on a written examination and interview, and appointed candidates will receive a salary under Pay Level 09 (₹53,100 – ₹1,67,800) along with allowances.

item.title: BSF Constable (GD) Sports Quota Vacancy 2025
item.description: The BSF Constable (GD) Sports Quota Recruitment 2025 offers an opportunity to join the Border Security Force through 549 Sports Quota vacancies across India. Both male and female candidates who are 10th pass and have recognized sports achievements at national or international level can apply online between 27/12/2025 and 15/01/2026 via rectt.bsf.gov.in. The final selection will be based on sports performance marks, PST, document verification, and medical examination as per the official BSF recruitment process.

item.title: PNB Local Bank Officer LBO Vacancy 2025 - Admit Card
item.description: Punjab National Bank (PNB) has released the official notification for LBO Recruitment 2025, offering 750 Local Bank Officer (LBO) vacancies across India. Eligible graduates with at least one year of banking experience can apply online from 03/11/2025 to 23/11/2025 through the official website pnbindia.in. The selection process includes an online written test and interview, and the appointment will be made in the Junior Management Grade Scale-I. Candidates are advised to check their eligibility, fees, age limit, and local language proficiency before applying

item.title: UP Police SI Confidential, ASI Clerk and Accounts Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has issued the official notification for Police Sub Inspector (Confidential) and Police Assistant Sub Inspector (Clerk and Accounts) posts for the year 2025. Released under Advertisement No. PRPB-B (Cl.)/2025, the recruitment includes a total of 537 vacancies. Online applications will be accepted from 20/12/2025 to 19/01/2026. Selection of candidates will be based on a written examination, followed by skill test wherever applicable, document verification and medical examination. Physical Standard Test (PST) will be conducted, and no Physical Efficiency Test (PET) is included.

item.title: SHS Bihar ANM Vacancy 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: Bihar SHS is inviting online applications for 5,006 ANM vacancies under HSC, RBSK, and NUHM programs. Only female candidates with a 2-year ANM diploma and BNRC registration are eligible. Applications are open from 14 to 28 August 2025, with selection based on a CBT and document verification. The monthly salary is ₹15,000.

item.title: SSC CPO SI 2025 - Answer Key Out
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for CPO SI Recruitment 2025, offering 3073 vacancies for Sub-Inspector posts in Delhi Police and CAPFs. Eligible candidates with a bachelor’s degree can apply online from 26 September to 16 October 2025. The selection process includes a Computer-Based Test (Paper-I & II), Physical Tests (PST/PET), Medical Examination, and Document Verification. This recruitment provides an excellent opportunity for graduates to join Delhi Police and CAPFs with a pay scale of Level-6 (₹35,400 – ₹1,12,400).

item.title: RPSC Protection Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: RPSC Protection Officer Recruitment 2025–26 offers an opportunity for candidates to apply for 12 Protection Officer vacancies in the Women and Child Development Department, Government of Rajasthan. The online application window will remain open between 24 December 2025 and 22 January 2026. Applicants possessing the prescribed qualification in Law or Social Work are eligible to apply. Selection of candidates will be carried out through a written test and subsequent document verification as per the official recruitment rules.

item.title: BTSC Sports Trainer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has issued the Sports Trainer (क्रीड़ा प्रशिक्षक) Recruitment 2025 notification for 48 posts. Candidates with Graduation and required sports qualification or those who have represented at state or national level in sports are eligible to apply. The online application window will remain open from 22/12/2025 to 22/01/2026. Selection will be carried out through a Computer Based Test (CBT) as per BTSC recruitment rules. This is a valuable opportunity for candidates looking for sports-related government jobs in Bihar.

item.title: RRB Section Controller Vacancy 2025- Exam Date
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has announced 368 vacancies for Section Controller posts through CEN 04/2025. The online application process will be open from 15 September to 14 October 2025. Candidates with a graduation degree and age between 20 to 33 years can apply. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test, skill test (if required), document verification, and medical examination. The post offers a Level 6 pay scale with attractive allowances.

item.title: UP Home Guard Vacancy 2025 - Exam Date
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Home Guard Recruitment 2025 has announced 41,424 vacancies for Home Guard (Male/Female) posts across all districts of the state. The online application process will run from 18 November 2025 to 17 December 2025. Candidates must have passed Class 10 (High School) from a recognized board and must be between 18 to 30 years of age as on 01 July 2025. The selection process includes Physical Standards Test (PST) and Physical Efficiency Test (PET), where male candidates must complete 4.8 km in 28 minutes and female candidates must complete 2.4 km in 16 minutes. The application fee is ₹400 for General/OBC/EWS and ₹300 for SC/ST candidates. The complete district-wise vacancy list and PET/PST rules are provided in the official notification.

item.title: IBPS RRBs CRP XIV Office Assistant Scale-I Mains/ Scale II, III Admit Card 2025
item.description: IBPS has announced the CRP RRBs XIV Recruitment 2025-26 with 13217 vacancies for Office Assistants and Officers (Scale I, II & III) in Regional Rural Banks. Online applications are open from 1st to 21st September 2025 at ibps.in

item.title: RSSB Ayush Officer Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSSB), Jaipur has issued Advertisement No. 06/2025 for the recruitment of 1535 Contractual Ayush Officers (Ayurved, Homoeopathy, Unani) under the National Health Mission (NHM), Rajasthan. Eligible candidates can apply online through the SSO Rajasthan Portal from 10 October 2025 to 08 November 2025. The recruitment will be on a one-year contract basis, extendable as per the project duration.

item.title: RSSB Jamadar Grade-II Admit Card 2025
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the official notification for Jamadar Grade-II Recruitment 2025 under the Public Works Department (PWD). A total of 72 posts are available — 64 for Non-Scheduled Area and 8 for Scheduled Area. Eligible candidates who have passed Senior Secondary (12th) and possess a valid computer qualification (like RSCIT, DOEACC “O” Level, COPA, or Diploma in Computer Science) can apply online. The online application process will be active from 17/10/2025 to 15/11/2025, and the OMR-based exam will be conducted on 27/12/2025.

item.title: UP Police Computer Operator Grade-A Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has released the Police Computer Operator Grade-A Recruitment 2025 notification to fill 1352 posts. This recruitment is open to Intermediate pass candidates with a valid computer qualification certificate. The online application process will remain active from 16 December 2025 to 15 January 2026. The selection process includes a written examination followed by document verification, strictly as per the official notification.

item.title: UPPSC Polytechnic Lecturer Vacancy 2025
item.description: UPPSC has invited online applications for 513 posts under the Technical Education (Teaching) Service 2025. The recruitment includes Polytechnic Lecturers, Architecture faculty and Workshop Superintendent. Candidates with First Class Engineering degrees or First Class Master’s degrees in relevant subjects can apply. The online form is open from 02 December 2025 to 02 January 2026.

item.title: IOCL Non-Executive Personnel Vacancy 2025
item.description: Indian Oil Corporation Limited has released the IOCL Non-Executive Recruitment 2025 notification for filling multiple non-executive positions in its refinery units across India. The recruitment is open to Diploma and B.Sc qualified candidates for posts including Junior Engineering Assistant, Junior Technical Assistant and Junior Quality Control Analyst. The selection will be carried out through a Computer Based Test followed by a qualifying Skill/Proficiency/Physical Test. Interested candidates can apply online between 20 December 2025 and 09 January 2026. The offered pay scale ranges from ₹25,000 to ₹1,05,000 with standard PSU allowances.

item.title: CCRH Research Officer & Other Posts Answer key 2025
item.description: The Central Council for Research in Homoeopathy (CCRH), under the Ministry of AYUSH, Government of India, has released the CCRH Recruitment 2025 Notification (Advt. No. 179/2025-26) for 48 vacancies across Group A, B and C posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 05 November 2025 to 26 November 2025 through the official websites - ccrhindia.ayush.gov.in, ccrhonline.in or eapplynow.com. The recruitment includes posts like Research Officer, Junior Librarian, Pharmacist, X-Ray Technician, LDC, and Driver. Selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (CBT) and an interview (for Group-A). Interested applicants should read the full notification for eligibility, qualification, age limit, and application fee details before applying.

item.title: CCRH Staff Nurse, MLT, Stenographer & ARO Answer Key 2025
item.description: Central Council for Research in Homoeopathy (CCRH) has released the official notification Advt. No. 180/2025-26 for 42 Group B & C vacancies including Staff Nurse, Medical Laboratory Technologist, Junior Stenographer, Junior MLT, and Assistant Research Officer (Pharmacognosy). The online application process will be open from 05/11/2025 to 26/11/2025. Candidates must apply through the official website www.ccrhindia.nic.in. The application fee is ₹500 for UR/OBC/EWS, while SC/ST/PwD/Female candidates are exempted. Selection will be based on a Computer Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification.

item.title: BOI Credit Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of India has announced Credit Officer Recruitment 2025 for 514 posts under GBO Stream. The recruitment includes MMGS-II, MMGS-III and SMGS-IV scales. Selection will be through online exam and interview.

item.title: SSC Jr Engineer Answer Key 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for the Junior Engineer (JE) Recruitment 2025. The vacancies are available in various departments such as BRO, CPWD, CWC, MES, NTRO, and others for trades including Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical. Candidates must have a Diploma or Degree in the relevant engineering discipline. Some departments also require two years of work experience. The application process is completely online, and the selection will be based on a Computer-Based Test (Paper 1), Paper 2, and Document Verification. This recruitment is open to both male and female candidates across India. Interested applicants can visit the official SSC website https://ssc.gov.in for more details and to apply online.

item.title: RSSB Village Development Officer VDO Result 2025
item.description: राजस्थान कर्मचारी चयन बोर्ड (RSSB) द्वारा ग्राम विकास अधिकारी (VDO) पदों पर भर्ती के लिए अधिसूचना जारी कर दी गई है। इच्छुक और पात्र उम्मीदवार जो भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त विश्वविद्यालय से स्नातक हैं और जिनके पास O लेवल, COPA, DPCS, कंप्यूटर डिप्लोमा या RS-CIT प्रमाण पत्र है, वे इस भर्ती के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं। भर्ती से जुड़ी पात्रता, आयु सीमा, आवेदन तिथि, चयन प्रक्रिया और अन्य जानकारी के लिए आधिकारिक नोटिफिकेशन जरूर पढ़ें।

item.title: SBI Probationary Officers PO Final Result 2025 Out
item.description: The State Bank of India (SBI) has released the notification for the recruitment of 541 Probationary Officer (PO) posts, including 500 regular posts and 41 backlog posts. Candidates must have a Bachelor’s degree in any stream from a recognized university in India to be eligible. The category-wise distribution of vacancies is as follows: UR – 203, OBC – 135, EWS – 50, SC – 80, and ST – 73. The application process will be conducted online through the official SBI website at sbi.co.in. This is a golden opportunity for graduates seeking a prestigious career in banking with SBI.

item.title: BRLPS JEEViKA Answer Key 2025
item.description: Bihar Rural Livelihoods Promotion Society (BRLPS), under the Rural Development Department of the Government of Bihar, has released the official notification for JEEViKA Recruitment 2025. A total of 2747 vacancies have been announced across various posts including Block Project Manager, Livelihood Specialist, Area Coordinator, Accountant, Office Assistant, Community Coordinator, and Block IT Executive. The required educational qualifications vary by post, ranging from Intermediate (for female Community Coordinators) to Graduation, Post-Graduation, Diploma, or B.Tech. The minimum age for applicants is 18 years, while the upper age limit goes up to 42 years depending on the category. The selection process involves a Computer-Based Test (CBT) and a typing test for relevant positions. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official website https://brlps.in from 30th July to 18th August 2025. This is a great opportunity to contribute to Bihar’s largest rural development mission and support the empowerment of rural communities.

item.title: Bihar Vidhan Parishad Admit Card 2025
item.description: Bihar Vidhan Parishad Secretariat has released the official notification for 24 vacancies including 09 Driver and 15 Office Attendant posts. Eligible candidates with a minimum qualification of Matric (10th Pass) can apply online from 29/09/2025 to 20/10/2025. Selection will be based on a written exam, while Driver posts also require a driving skill test. Interested applicants are advised to read the official notification for detailed eligibility, age limit, and application process.

item.title: BSF Head Constable (RO/RM) PET / PST Admit Card 2025
item.description: BSF is inviting online applications for 1121 Head Constable (RO & RM) posts under the BSF Head Constable Recruitment 2025. The application process will run from 24 August to 23 September 2025. Candidates with 12th PCM (60% marks) or 10th + ITI in relevant trades can apply. The selection process includes a written test, physical standards test, and medical examination. This is a great opportunity to join the Border Security Force in technical roles.

item.title: UP Police Assistant Operator Online Form 2025
item.description: UP Police has released the Assistant Operator Recruitment 2025 for 44 posts under the Police Radio Cadre. Eligible 12th PCM passed candidates aged 18–22 years can apply online from 03/12/2025 to 02/01/2026. The selection includes a written exam, PST, PET and document verification. Application fee is ₹500 for General/OBC/EWS and ₹400 for SC/ST.

item.title: IB Security Assistant/Executive Result 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has released a notification for the recruitment of Security Assistant/Executive posts for the year 2025. A total of 4987 vacancies are available across various states and Union Territories. Candidates must have passed 10th standard, possess knowledge of the local language/dialect, and hold a domicile certificate of the region applied for. The post offers a Level-3 pay scale (₹21,700 – ₹69,100) along with special allowances. This is a central government Group ‘C’ non-gazetted, non-ministerial post, offering job security and growth in the intelligence sector. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the official portal before the last date.

item.title: DSSSB Multi Tasking Staff (MTS) Vacancy 2025
item.description: DSSSB MTS Recruitment 2025 has been announced for 714 Multi-Tasking Staff (Group-C) posts in various Delhi Government departments. Eligible 10th pass candidates can apply online from 17 December 2025 to 15 January 2026. Selection will be through a CBT exam with negative marking.

item.title: Assam Police Constable Vacancy 2025
item.description: Assam Police ने 1715 Constable (UB & AB) पदों के लिए नई भर्ती अधिसूचना जारी की है। आवेदन प्रक्रिया 16/12/2025 से 16/01/2026 तक ऑनलाइन चलेगी और इसके लिए कोई शुल्क नहीं लिया जाएगा। केवल Assam के स्थायी निवासियों को आवेदन की अनुमति है। योग्यता में UB के लिए 12th pass और AB के लिए 10th pass शामिल है। चयन में PST, PET, Written Test और Viva-Voce शामिल होंगे।

item.title: Bombay High Court Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bombay High Court Bharti 2025–26 में कुल 2381 पदों पर बड़ी भर्ती जारी की गई है, जिसमें Clerk, Peon, Driver और Stenographer शामिल हैं। आवेदन प्रक्रिया 15 दिसंबर 2025 से 5 जनवरी 2026 तक चलेगी। योग्य उम्मीदवार अपनी शैक्षणिक योग्यता और स्किल्स के अनुसार ऑनलाइन आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.title: Delhi DDA Recruitment 2025- Admit Card
item.description: The Delhi Development Authority (DDA) has released its Recruitment Notification 2025 for a total of 1732 vacancies across various posts including Deputy Director, Assistant Director, Junior Engineer, Stenographer, Patwari, Mali, and Multi Tasking Staff (MTS). The online application process is scheduled from 06 October 2025 to 05 November 2025, and the Computer Based Test (CBT) is expected in December 2025 – January 2026. Candidates can apply online through the official DDA website. The recruitment includes category-wise vacancies (UR, EWS, SC, ST, OBC) and posts for ESM / PwBD candidates. Qualifications vary by post, ranging from 10th/12th pass to Graduate/Degree holders in relevant fields.

item.title: IIMC Non-Teaching Vacancy 2025
item.description: IIMC Non-Teaching Recruitment 2025 offers a total of 51 vacancies for various Group A, B and C posts. The selection process includes a written examination, skill test and interview (for Group A posts). Candidates must apply online by 12 January 2026.

item.title: Railway RRB Group D Admit Card 2025
item.description: Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has officially announced the RRB Group D Exam Date 2025. The CBT will be conducted from 17 November 2025 to the end of December 2025. City intimation slips will be released around 10 days before the exam and admit cards will be available 4 days prior. Candidates must regularly check their respective RRB regional websites for latest updates and instructions.

item.title: BTSC Pump Operator Online Form 2025
item.description: BTSC Bihar has released the Pump Operator Recruitment 2025 notification for 191 vacancies. Candidates with 10th (Matric) and ITI qualification in Machinist or Fitter trade can apply online from 12 December 2025 to 12 January 2026. Selection will be based on a Computer Based Test (CBT) followed by document verification.

item.title: BTSC Dental Hygienist Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has released the Dental Hygienist Recruitment 2025 notification for 702 posts under the Health Department. Eligible candidates with a Diploma in Dental Hygienist can apply online from 10 October to 10 November 2025. Selection will be based on a merit list prepared from academic qualifications. Check eligibility, salary, and application process below.

item.title: BTSC Hostel Manager Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has released the Hostel Manager Recruitment 2025 notification for 91 posts under the Backward and Extremely Backward Class Welfare Department. Eligible candidates with a Bachelor’s Degree or Diploma in Hotel Management can apply online through the official website btsc.bihar.gov.in. The selection will be based on a written examination and document verification. Candidates are advised to check the eligibility criteria, age limit, and reservation details before submitting the online form.

item.title: BTSC Works Supervisor Vacancy 2025
item.description: BTSC Works Supervisor Recruitment 2025 (Advt. 25/2025) is out for 1114 posts under PHED Bihar. Apply online from 10 Oct to 10 Nov 2025. Eligibility: Matric (10th) + ITI in Draughtsman (Civil) / Surveyor / Plumber. Selection via CBT (100 MCQs, 2 hrs, 0.25 negative); Level-2 pay; category-wise and 35% female (horizontal) reservation applicable.

item.title: BTSC Work Inspector Mechanical Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Technical Service Commission (BTSC) has invited online applications for 493 Work Inspector (Mechanical) posts under the 2025 recruitment. Applicants must have passed 10th along with an ITI certificate in relevant mechanical trades. The online application process will remain open from 12 December 2025 to 12 January 2026, and selection will be done through a CBT followed by document verification.

item.title: BSF Constable Tradesman PET / PST Admit Card 2025
item.description: The Border Security Force (BSF) has released a notification for recruitment to various posts. This opportunity is open to both male and female candidates. The posts include Constable, Head Constable, ASI (Steno), and other technical and non-technical categories. Educational qualifications vary by post, such as 10th pass, 12th pass, or a diploma in the relevant trade. Candidates must meet the prescribed physical standards and go through the selection process, which includes a written examination, physical test, document verification, and medical examination.

item.title: BTSC Junior Engineer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Technical Service Commission has announced 2809 Junior Engineer posts for Civil, Electrical and Mechanical disciplines. Candidates holding a relevant engineering diploma are eligible to apply online from 12 December 2025 to 11 January 2026. The recruitment process will be conducted through a CBT-based examination.

item.title: IAF AFCAT 01/2026 Batch Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Indian Air Force (IAF) has announced the AFCAT 01/2026 Batch Recruitment 2025 for Flying and Ground Duty (Technical & Non-Technical) branches. The online application process will begin on 10 November 2025 and continue till 9 December 2025 through the official website afcat.cdac.in. Candidates holding a graduate or engineering degree with Physics and Mathematics at 10+2 level can apply. The selection process includes an online written test, AFSB interview, and medical examination. Successful candidates will join the AFCAT 01/2026 course commencing in January 2026 as Group-A Gazetted Officers in the Indian Air Force

item.title: CSIR NCL Technician (1) & Technical Assistant Vacancy 2025
item.description: CSIR NCL Recruitment 2025 invites applications for 34 Technical posts, including Technician (1) and Technical Assistant. Candidates with ITI, Diploma or B.Sc qualifications can apply between 12 December 2025 and 12 January 2026. The selection process consists of a Trade Test followed by a competitive written examination.

item.title: KVS LDE/LDCE Teaching and Non-Teaching Vacancy 2025
item.description: KVS LDE/DE Recruitment 2026 offers 2499 vacancies for teaching and administrative posts including Principal, Vice-Principal, PGT, TGT, Head Master, Section Officer and Secretariat Assistant. Eligible KVS employees can submit their applications online between 11 December 2025 and 26 December 2025, with verification open till 02 January 2026. The departmental examination will be held on 15 February 2026, and no application fee is applicable.

item.title: SHS Bihar Ophthalmic Assistant Admit Card 2025
item.description: State Health Society Bihar is inviting applications for 220 Ophthalmic Assistant posts under Advt. No. 07/2025. Candidates with 10+2 in Biology/Mathematics and a 2-year Diploma in Optometry or Ophthalmic Assistant are eligible. The application window is open from 14 to 28 August 2025, with a monthly salary of ₹15,000. Selection will be through CBT, document verification, and medical examination.

item.title: UPPSC Assistant Teacher Bharti 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: The Directorate of Medical Education and Research (DMER) has announced a recruitment drive for 7466 Assistant Teacher posts. Candidates must hold a Bachelor’s Degree in the relevant subject from any recognized university in India. Detailed eligibility criteria and subject-wise qualifications will be released soon. Interested applicants are advised to stay updated with the official notification and prepare to apply online as per the given schedule.

item.title: IBPS SO XV 15th Mains Result 2025 Out
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for the Specialist Officer (SO) CRP SPL-XV Recruitment 2025. A total of 1007 vacancies have been announced for various Scale I posts including IT Officer, Agriculture Field Officer (AFO), Rajbhasha Adhikari, Law Officer, HR/Personnel Officer, and Marketing Officer. The online application process will be open from 1st July 2025 to 21st July 2025. The Preliminary Examination is scheduled for August 2025, followed by the Main Examination in November 2025. Interviews are likely to be conducted in January/February 2026. Applications will be accepted in online mode only. For more details and to apply, visit the official website www.ibps.in.

item.title: SSC 10+2 CHSL 2025 Answer Key Out
item.description: कर्मचारी चयन आयोग (SSC) द्वारा CHSL (10+2) भर्ती 2025 का नोटिफिकेशन जारी किया गया है। इस भर्ती के अंतर्गत लोअर डिवीजन क्लर्क (LDC), डाटा एंट्री ऑपरेटर (DEO), डाक सहायक (PA) व छंटाई सहायक (SA) जैसे पदों पर नियुक्तियाँ की जाएंगी। भारत के किसी भी मान्यता प्राप्त बोर्ड से 12वीं (इंटरमीडिएट) उत्तीर्ण उम्मीदवार इसके लिए आवेदन कर सकते हैं। आवेदन प्रक्रिया पूरी तरह ऑनलाइन है।

item.title: Haryana Medical Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Haryana Health Department is inviting applications for 450 Medical Officer (HCMS-I) posts. MBBS candidates can apply online from 08 December 2025 to 07 January 2026. Check eligibility, age limit, fees and full notification details.

item.title: AAI Junior Assistant & Senior Assistant Vacancy 2025
item.description: AAI NER Recruitment 2025 offers 14 Non-Executive posts. The selection includes CBT, document verification and physical tests for Fire Services. Applications are open online for eligible candidates

item.title: IB Multi Tasking Staff Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau has released the IB MTS Recruitment 2025 notification for 362 Multi-Tasking Staff (General) posts across various SIBs in India. Candidates who have passed Class 10 and possess a valid state domicile certificate can apply online from 22/11/2025 to 14/12/2025. The selection process includes a Tier-I objective exam and a Tier-II descriptive exam. Application fees are ₹650 for General/OBC/EWS male applicants and ₹550 for all other categories.

item.title: Delhi Police Head Constable Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Staff Selection Commission (SSC) has released the notification for Delhi Police Head Constable (Assistant Wireless Operator/Tele-Printer Operator) Recruitment 2025. A total of 552 vacancies are available, including 370 posts for male candidates and 182 posts for female candidates. The online application process will remain open from 24 September to 15 October 2025. Candidates must have passed 10+2 with Science and Mathematics or hold an NTC in Mechanic-cum-Operator Electronic Communication System. The age limit is 18 to 27 years, with applicable relaxations for reserved categories. The selection process includes a Computer Based Examination, Physical Endurance & Measurement Test (PE&MT), Trade Test, and Computer Proficiency Test. The pay scale is Level-4 (₹25,500 – ₹81,100) as per the 7th CPC.

item.title: BPSC Sports Officer Exam Date Out 2025
item.description: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has announced 33 vacancies for the posts of District Sports Officer, Assistant Director (Sports/Youth), and Lecturer (SH & Colleges) under the Bihar Sports Service Cadre through Advt. No. 90/2025. Candidates with a Graduate Degree and a Diploma/PG Diploma in Sports Coaching from a recognized institute are eligible to apply. The online application window will remain open from 02 September 2025 to 30 September 2025, and applicants need to pay a fee of ₹100/- plus bank charges. This is a good opportunity for candidates with sports coaching qualifications to build their career in the Bihar Sports Department.

item.title: Bihar PCS 71st Mains Online Form 2025
item.description: बिहार लोक सेवा आयोग (BPSC) ने 71वीं संयुक्त प्रतियोगिता परीक्षा (CCE) 2025 का नोटिफिकेशन जारी कर दिया है। यह परीक्षा विभिन्न प्रशासनिक पदों जैसे DSP, SDM, बीडीओ, राजस्व अधिकारी आदि के लिए आयोजित की जाती है। आवेदन प्रक्रिया ऑनलाइन मोड में होगी और सभी भारत के योग्य उम्मीदवार आवेदन कर सकते हैं।

item.title: IPPB Executive Result 2025
item.description: India Post Payments Bank (IPPB) has released the Executive Recruitment 2025 notification for 348 vacancies on engagement from existing Gramin Dak Sevaks (GDS) of the Department of Posts. Eligible GDS employees having a Graduate degree in any discipline can apply online from 09/10/2025 to 29/10/2025 at www.ippbonline.com. Selected candidates will receive a monthly salary of ₹30,000, and selection will be based on merit of graduation marks. The recruitment aims to strengthen IPPB’s doorstep banking network across India by engaging trained GDS executives.

item.title: RSSB Patwari Bharti 2025 Result Out
item.description: Rajasthan Staff Selection Board (RSMSSB) has released the notification for Patwari Bharti 2025. A total of 3705 vacancies are available, including 522 posts for TSP areas and 3183 posts for Non-TSP areas. Candidates must have a Bachelor’s Degree and a recognized Computer qualification such as NIELIT O Level, COPA, RS-CIT, or a Diploma/Degree in Computer Science/Application.

item.title: UP Police Sub Inspector SI Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Police Recruitment and Promotion Board (UPPRPB) has announced the UP Police Sub Inspector (SI) Recruitment 2025. The online application process will be open from 12 August 2025 to 11 September 2025, and fee adjustments for submitted payments can be made until 13 September 2025. The application fee is ₹500/- for General, EWS, and OBC candidates, while SC and ST candidates will have to pay ₹400/-. The recruitment is for posts in Uttar Pradesh, and applications must be submitted online.

item.title: OICL Administrative Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Oriental Insurance Company Limited (OICL) has released the OICL AO Recruitment 2025 notification for 300 vacancies, including 285 Generalist and 15 Hindi Officer posts. Eligible candidates can apply online from 01/12/2025 to 15/12/2025. The selection process includes Prelims, Mains, and Interview. Candidates must check eligibility, age limit, and qualification before applying.

item.title: IBPS Probationary Officer PO 15th Mains Result 2025 – Download Now
item.description: The Institute of Banking Personnel Selection (IBPS) has released the notification for CRP PO/MT-XV Recruitment 2025 for the post of Probationary Officer (PO)/Management Trainee (MT). A total of 5208 vacancies have been announced across 8 participating public sector banks. Candidates who hold a Bachelor’s Degree in any discipline from a recognized university in India are eligible to apply. The recruitment process includes a preliminary exam, main exam, and interview. Applications must be submitted online through the official IBPS website www.ibps.in. Selected candidates will be appointed across various locations in India.

item.title: CGPSC Assistant Professor Online Form 2025
item.description: CGPSC Assistant Professor (Medical Education) Recruitment 2025 के तहत कुल 125 पदों के लिए ऑनलाइन आवेदन आमंत्रित किए गए हैं। आवेदन 25 नवंबर से 24 दिसंबर 2025 तक स्वीकार किए जाएंगे। इस भर्ती में संबंधित मेडिकल स्पेशलिटी में MD/MS/DNB योग्यता और न्यूनतम 1 वर्ष का Senior Resident अनुभव आवश्यक है। Chhattisgarh domicile उम्मीदवारों के लिए फीस में छूट और परीक्षा में उपस्थित होने पर फीस रिफंड का प्रावधान है।

item.title: CGPSC SSE Vacancy 2025
item.description: CGPSC SSE 2025 भर्ती में कुल 238 पद जारी किए गए हैं। आवेदन 01 से 30 दिसंबर 2025 तक ऑनलाइन होंगे। योग्यता स्नातक, आयु सीमा 21–30 वर्ष (CG Domicile: 35 वर्ष) है। चयन प्रक्रिया में Pre, Mains और Interview शामिल हैं। SC/ST/OBC के लिए आवेदन शुल्क ₹300 और अन्य सभी के लिए ₹400 है।

item.title: UP Panchayati Raj Block Project Manager Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Panchayati Raj Department has released the notification for 826 Block Project Manager (BPM) posts under the RGSA scheme. Eligible graduates with 60% marks and valid computer certificates can apply online from 01/12/2025 to 15/12/2025. No written exam will be conducted; selection will be based on merit, qualifications, and verification. Candidates are advised to read the official notification for detailed eligibility and instructions.

item.title: RBI Officer Grade B Phase II Admit Card 2025
item.description: Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has announced 120 vacancies for Grade B Officers in General, DEPR, and DSIM streams. The application window will remain open from 10 September to 30 September 2025. Phase I examination is scheduled on 18–19 October 2025, while Phase II will be held on 6–7 December 2025. Candidates must carefully read the official notification for detailed eligibility criteria, qualifications, age limit, and application fees before applying online.

item.title: UPPSC Computer Assistant Exam Date 2025
item.description: The Uttar Pradesh Public Service Commission (UPPSC) has released a notification for the recruitment of Computer Assistant posts in 2025. A total of 13 vacancies have been announced for eligible male and female candidates across India. To apply, candidates must have passed 10+2 (Intermediate) along with either a valid “O” Level certificate from NIELIT or a Diploma in Computer Science. The minimum age required is 18 years, and selected candidates will receive an initial salary in the ₹25,500 – ₹81,100 pay scale (Level-4). The application process is online only and will be available soon on the official website uppsc.up.nic.in. Interested candidates are advised to regularly check the website for the release of the online form and notification.

item.title: RRB NTPC Inter Level Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has released the notification for RRB NTPC Inter Level Recruitment 2025 (CEN 07/2025) with 3050 vacancies under the 10+2 (Undergraduate) category. Eligible candidates who have passed Intermediate (Class 12th) can apply online for posts like Junior Clerk cum Typist, Accounts Clerk cum Typist, Train Clerk, and Commercial cum Ticket Clerk. The application process will start from 28 October 2025 and continue till 27 November 2025. The selection process includes CBT-1, CBT-2, Typing Skill Test (for Clerk/Typist posts), Document Verification, and Medical Examination. The pay scale ranges from ₹19,900 to ₹21,700 (Level-2 & Level-3 as per 7th CPC) with additional allowances. Candidates are advised to check the official notification for complete eligibility, age limit, application fees, and exam details.

item.title: RSPCB JSO & JEE Vacancy 2025
item.description: RSPCB has announced 100 vacancies for Junior Scientific Officer and Junior Environmental Engineer. Candidates can apply online from 26 November to 16 December 2025. The notification includes eligibility criteria, age limits, application fees and detailed instructions for uploading documents and completing the online form.

item.title: CSIR CDRI Technical Assistant & Technician Vacancy 2025
item.description: CSIR CDRI has released the notification for Technical Assistant and Technician (1) posts under Advt. No. 10/2025 with a total of 44 vacancies. The online application process starts on 25/11/2025 and will remain open till 26/12/2025. Candidates from all over India can apply. The qualification required includes B.Sc./Diploma for Technical Assistant and 10th with ITI for Technician posts. The selection will be based on written examination and skill test as per post requirements.

item.title: RRB NTPC Graduate Level Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) has announced the RRB NTPC Graduate Level Recruitment 2025 (CEN 06/2025) with around 5800 vacancies under the graduate category. Eligible candidates with a Bachelor’s degree can apply online for posts such as Station Master, Goods Guard, Senior Clerk cum Typist, Junior Accounts Assistant, Commercial Apprentice, and Traffic Assistant. The online application window will remain open from 21 October 2025 to 20 November 2025. The selection process includes CBT-1, CBT-2, Computer Based Aptitude Test (for Station Master & Traffic Assistant), Typing Skill Test (for Clerk/Typist posts), Document Verification, and Medical Examination. The salary ranges from ₹25,500 to ₹35,400 (Level-4 to Level-6 as per 7th CPC) along with allowances. Candidates must check the official notification for detailed eligibility, post-wise vacancies, exam pattern, and other important updates.

item.title: IMD Project Scientist Vacancy 2025
item.description: India Meteorological Department (IMD) has released Advertisement No. 02/2025 for the recruitment of 134 Project Staff posts on a contractual basis under the Mission Mausam Scheme. The vacancies include Project Scientist (E, III, II, I), Scientific Assistant, and Admin Assistant. Eligible M.Sc. and B.Tech candidates from relevant fields can apply online from 24/11/2025 to 14/12/2025. No application fee is mentioned in the notification. The engagement will initially be for one year and may be extended based on performance up to 31 March 2026.

item.title: Bihar BSSC 4th Graduate Level Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the official notification for the 4th Graduate Level Combined Competitive Examination 2025. This recruitment aims to fill 1481 vacancies across various departments of the Bihar Government. The posts include Assistant Branch Officer, Planning Assistant, Junior Statistical Assistant, Data Entry Operator (Grade-C), Auditor in the Finance Department, and Auditor in Cooperative Societies. Candidates must be graduates, with specific subject qualifications required for certain posts. The online application process will be open from 18 August to 19 September 2025. The selection will be done through a Preliminary Exam (objective type and open book with NCERT/BSEB textbooks), followed by a Main Exam and Document Verification. The application fee is ₹540 for General/BC/EBC (male) and outside Bihar candidates, and ₹135 for SC/ST, women (Bihar residents), and PwD candidates. Interested and eligible candidates can apply through the official BSSC website at https://bssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: Bihar BSSC Office Attendant / Attendant (Special) Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Office Attendant / Attendant (Special) posts under advertisement number 06/25. A total of 3727 vacancies have been announced across multiple departments of the Bihar government. Candidates who have passed the 10th (Matric) examination from a recognized board are eligible to apply. The online application process will begin on 25th August 2025 and remain open until 26th September 2025. The selection will be done through a preliminary objective-type written examination, followed by a main exam for shortlisted candidates. The minimum age limit is 18 years, and the upper age limit varies by category, with applicable relaxations. Reservation benefits will be given as per Bihar government rules, including 35% horizontal reservation for women and 4% for PwD candidates. The recruitment offers a Level-1 pay scale, and candidates are advised to read the full notification before applying online through the official BSSC website: https://bssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: BSSC Stenographer Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has released the official notification Advt. No. 07/2025 for the recruitment of 432 Stenographer and Stenotypist Grade-III posts in various departments and district offices. The minimum qualification required is Intermediate (10+2) or equivalent along with stenography (Hindi/English), typing, and basic computer knowledge. The selected candidates will get a salary in Pay Level-4 (₹25,500 – ₹81,100/-). The age limit is 18 to 37 years for UR male, 40 years for UR female, OBC and EBC candidates, and 42 years for SC/ST candidates, with 10 years of additional relaxation for PwD candidates. The application fee is ₹100/- to be paid online. The online registration will be open from 25th September 2025 to 5th November 2025, and the last date for fee payment is 3rd November 2025. Interested candidates can apply online only through the official website bssc.bihar.gov.in

item.title: BSSC Sports Trainer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has announced 379 vacancies for Sports Instructor/Trainer under Advt. No. 08/2025. The selection will be based on a written exam (150 marks) and interview (50 marks). Online applications are open from 09/10/2025 to 11/11/2025 at bssc.bihar.gov.in.

item.title: NPCIL Deputy Manager & Jr. Hindi Translator Vacancy 2025
item.description: The Nuclear Power Corporation of India Limited (NPCIL) has released the NPCIL Recruitment 2025 notification for 122 vacancies including Deputy Manager (HR, F&A, C&MM, Legal) and Junior Hindi Translator (JHT). The online application process will be open from 07 November to 27 November 2025 at npcilcareers.co.in. Candidates with MBA, CA, CMA, CFA, LLB, or Postgraduate qualifications can apply online. Selected candidates will receive a salary of up to ₹86,955 per month along with various allowances and benefits. Posting can be anywhere in India under the Department of Atomic Energy.

item.title: MHA Intelligence Bureau ACIO Result 2025
item.description: The Intelligence Bureau (IB), under the Ministry of Home Affairs (MHA), has announced the recruitment of 3717 posts for Assistant Central Intelligence Officer (ACIO) Grade-II / Executive. Applicants must possess a Bachelor’s Degree in any stream from a recognized university in India. The selection process involves a written examination followed by an interview. Eligible candidates can apply online through the official MHA website.

item.title: WBBPE Assistant Teacher Vacancy 2025
item.description: The West Bengal Board of Primary Education (WBBPE) has released the official notification for 13,421 Assistant Teacher (Primary) posts in Government and Government-aided schools. The online application process will run from 19 November 2025 (3:00 PM) to 9 December 2025 (11:59 PM). Candidates with 12th + D.El.Ed or B.El.Ed are eligible. The application fee is ₹600 for General, ₹500 for OBC, and ₹300 for SC/ST/PH applicants. Selection will be based on merit, interview, and document verification.

item.title: BOI Specialist Officer Vacancy 2025
item.description: Bank of India has released the Specialist Officer Recruitment 2025 for a total of 115 vacancies in Scale II III and IV. item.title: IOCL Junior Engineer Result 2025
item.description: IOCL Junior Engineer / Officer (Grade E0) Recruitment 2025 invites applications from Indian nationals with a 3-year diploma in Chemical, Mechanical, Electrical, or Instrumentation Engineering. Candidates must meet the minimum marks criteria (65% for General/EWS/OBC-NCL, 55% for SC/ST/PwBD) and age limits as per category. The selection process includes a Computer Based Test (CBT), followed by document verification and medical examination. Online applications start on 12/09/2025 and close on 28/09/2025. item.description: State Bank of India (SBI) has released the official notification for Junior Associate (Customer Support & Sales) recruitment under Advertisement No. CRPD/CR/2025-26/06. A total of 5583 vacancies have been announced, including 5180 regular and 403 backlog posts, to be filled across various states. The online application process will be open from 06 August to 26 August 2025. Candidates must hold a graduation degree in any discipline, with final year students also eligible to apply provisionally. The age limit is 20 to 28 years as on 01 April 2025, with age relaxation applicable as per government rules. The selection process includes an online Preliminary Exam, Main Exam, and a Local Language Proficiency Test (if applicable). The Preliminary exam is expected in September 2025, and the Main exam in November 2025. The starting basic salary is ₹26,730/-, with gross monthly emoluments of around ₹46,000/- in metro cities. The application fee is ₹750/- for General/OBC/EWS, while it is exempted for SC/ST/PwBD/Ex-servicemen. Selected candidates will be posted in the state/circle they apply for, and no inter-state transfer will be allowed. Interested candidates can apply online through the SBI official website: https://sbi.co.in/web/careers.

item.title: PFRDA Assistant Manager Phase-II Result 2025
item.description: The Pension Fund Regulatory and Development Authority (PFRDA) has released the notification for the recruitment of 40 Assistant Manager (Grade A) posts in various streams including General, Finance, IT, Research, Legal, Actuary, and Official Language. Interested candidates are advised to read the official notification carefully before applying.

item.description: Indian Overseas Bank (IOB) has released a notification for the recruitment of 127 Specialist Officers in MMG Scale II & III across various departments, including IT, Risk, Information Security, Treasury, Corporate Credit, Software Engineering, and Data Science. item.description: The National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development (NABARD) has released the Grade A Assistant Manager Recruitment 2025 notification for 91 vacancies across various streams including Generalist, Agriculture, IT, Finance, Legal, and Protocol & Security Service. item.description: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI) has released the official notification for the recruitment of Assistant Manager Grade A (General) and Manager Grade B (General, Legal, IT) posts, with a total of 76 vacancies. item.title: NHAI Deputy Manager, Accountant & Other Posts Vacancy 2025
item.description: The National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has released a notification for direct recruitment 2025 under the Ministry of Road Transport & Highways. Eligible candidates can apply online for various posts including Deputy Manager (Finance & Accounts), Accountant, Stenographer, Library Assistant, and Junior Translation Officer. item.description: he West Bengal Central School Service Commission (WBSSC) has released the notification for 1st State Level Selection Test (SLST) 2025 to recruit 8477 Non-Teaching Staff including Clerk (Group C) and Group D posts in government-aided schools. item.description: Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) has released the SEBI Officer Grade A (Assistant Manager) Recruitment 2025 notification for 110 vacancies across various streams including General, Legal, IT, Research, Official Language, Civil, and Electrical Engineering. item.description: The Life Insurance Corporation of India (LIC) has announced the LIC AE & AAO Recruitment 2025 for a total of 841 vacancies. The recruitment includes posts for Assistant Engineer (Civil/Electrical), Assistant Administrative Officer (AAO Specialist – CA, CS, Actuarial, Legal, Insurance), and AAO Generalist.
